instruction.title: Welcome to Tartu – university central!
instructionsArray: Make your way along the street where you see the ‘Athena’ sign.
Go past the red chairs and continue on to the intersection.
Turn right, head in the direction of the Apple logo and continue to the end of the street.
When you reach the square, see if you can find the fountain and head towards it.

quizpages.questions: What is propped up against the post near the fountain?
